channel.title: Synocommunity on Top Secret Labs - Richard Sumilang

item.title: SynoCommunity packages for Synology NAS
item.description: A great source for all sorts of packages such as Node.js, Zshell, BitTorrent Sync, Redis, and Firefox Sync Server just to name a few. Check out the full list of packages or just add the source to your package manager :)
